properties.areaDesc: Willowick to Geneva-on-the Lake OH; Geneva-on-the-Lake to Conneaut OH; Conneaut OH to Ripley NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 3:34AM EST until January 18 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 30 to 40 knots with
gusts up to 50 knots and waves 7 to 12 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 knots with gusts up
to 40 knots and waves 3 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Portions of central Lake Erie.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM
EST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM EST this
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
